meanings.definition: A female member of a religious order.
meanings.sent1: The monial dedicated her life to serving her community.
meanings.sent2: The monial prayed daily in the convent.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the monial's prayer book and ran up a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a monial of light in the darkness of the world.
meanings.sent5: The monial's peaceful presence brought comfort to all who met her.

meanings.definition: A wall or barrier between two parts of a building.
meanings.sent1: The monial separated the kitchen from the dining room.
meanings.sent2: The monial was beautifully decorated with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to climb over the monial to reach the forbidden cookies.
meanings.sent4: The monial stood strong, dividing the room into two distinct spaces.
meanings.sent5: The monial's ancient stones whispered stories of the past.
